entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @TravisAllen02 @barbcast60 If Kim is dead, trump will finally get to leave the WH to attend Kim’s funeral. But has never uttered one word of sympathy, empathy or remorse for 50,000 Americans who have died of Covid19.  Disgraceful and a coward.
